comments.creator: froydnj+bz@gmail.com
comments.author: froydnj+bz@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 605908
patch

AFAICT from bug 687361, the error codes in question are:

- NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_VERSION_ERR

This is actually needed (section 4.1, step 5).

- NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_RECOVERABLE_ERR

This is not needed, but it serves as a magic cookie; I am unsure of the best way to get rid of this.  Advice appreciated.

- NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_QUOTA_ERR

Superseded by NS_ERROR_DOM_QUOTA_EXCEEDED_ERR and not used.

- NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_DEADLOCK_ERR

Not used.

The attached patch deletes the last two.  WDYT?
comments.raw_text:
AFAICT from bug 687361, the error codes in question are:

- NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_VERSION_ERR

This is actually needed (section 4.1, step 5).

- NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_RECOVERABLE_ERR

This is not needed, but it serves as a magic cookie; I am unsure of the best way to get rid of this.  Advice appreciated.

- NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_QUOTA_ERR

Superseded by NS_ERROR_DOM_QUOTA_EXCEEDED_ERR and not used.

- NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_DEADLOCK_ERR

Not used.

The attached patch deletes the last two.  WDYT?
